LanguageData.ArtificialPelvis.label: artificial pelvis
LanguageData.ArtificialPelvis.description: Replaces a missing pelvis. Pretty useful if crawling is not your favourite way of moving around.
LanguageData.ArtificialClavicle.label: artificial clavicle
LanguageData.ArtificialClavicle.description: Replaces a missing clavicle. If you somehow manage to break yours.
